climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🚨NOTE: Pillows are vacuum-sealed during the shipping process. Upon receipt, gently pat the pillow to loosen the memory foam filling, and allow it to sit for 48 hours to achieve a more perfect body pillow!

SUPPORTIVE: Our body pillow is generously filled with memory foam, side sleeper pillow for neck and shoulder pain, ensuring optimal comfort and consistent support throughout your sleep. Say goodbye to lumps, half-flattening, or easy compression. This pillow is an excellent option whether you seek relaxation for your hips, back, neck, or stomach.

COOLING & SKIN-FRIENDLY: Our cooling body pillow is thoughtfully designed with distinct materials on each side. The cooling cover, fashioned from organic cotton textile fabric, delivers a refreshing cool sensation upon touch. On the alternate side, bamboo fiber ensures a soft and skin-friendly feel. You have the flexibility to choose either side based on your individual preferences and needs.

MULTI-SCENARIO APPLICATION: The cuddle pillows are support multiple position for different people’s need--adult, children and pregnant, help side sleepers support multiple body parts. It efficiently relieve back pain, pregnancy discomfort, body tired. All pillows are meet OEKO-TEX requirements to be free of harmful chemicals and substances. Pregnant do not have to worry about using.
MAINTENANCE: The bamboo pillowcase is removable. It can be taken off and machine-washed separately; tumble drying on low temperature is recommended.

SERVICE: We aspire for this full body pillow to guarantee your consistent sleep quality, promoting a comfortable and healthy lifestyle. Should you encounter any dissatisfaction during use, please reach out to us, and we will make every effort to ensure your purchase is truly meaningful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BRING AN EXTRA LEVEL OF COMFORT TO YOUR BED

Our pillow has about 6.6 lbs of shredded memory foam for a soft yet supportive feel. The inner cover has a zipper for flexibility. If you feel it's too heavy, remove some foam to lighten it for a more comfortable experience.
You Can Try This Get the Best Quality Sleep with Cooling Body Pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleeping on a Cloud!
reviews.reviewText: Just got the COLDHUNTER Body Pillow and it's a game changer! It's super supportive, thanks to the memory foam filling. No lumps or flat spots – just right for a comfy sleep. The cooling cover on one side is perfect for warm nights, and the soft bamboo side feels great on the skin. It's like two pillows in one!I use it in various positions, and it's great for anyone – adults, kids, or if you're pregnant. It relieves my back pain like a charm. Plus, it's OEKO-TEX certified, so no worries about harmful chemicals.Cleaning is easy – the bamboo cover zips off and goes right into the wash. And if there are any issues, their customer service seems ready to help. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a comfy night's sleep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great thick body pillow
reviews.reviewText: this is great thick and a bit heavy body pillow. it's foam so it squishes quite a bit and bounces back. It is thick and heavy so I gave less on easy to clean cause this is not going in a home washing machine. least not one with an agitator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow. It is sooo comfortable. I have spinal stenosis in my neck and it caused numb hands while I sleep. My physical therapist recommended a body pillow to raise my top leg and rest my arm above my body, basically it straightens my spine while I sleep and prevents the pinching that causes the numbness. This pillow has solved my ailment and is cooling to boot. No more numb hands. I actually bought two so I can flip over from left side sleeping to right side midway through the night and not have to move the pillow over. I had to take quite a bit of stuffing out of it so it's really nice to be able to do that...many of the pillows on the market don't have the zip closure. The only downside is that it can't be washed, but everything else about it is worth it. Five star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave it to my husband for a Christmas gift and he was happy with it but he was hoping it would stay cool longer all and all it is worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and supportive
reviews.reviewText: This body pillow is very supportive. It is also really heavy when you lift it and because of that, it is a little challenging when putting on a pillow case over it. I added a pillow case even though the pillow comes with a cover. I didn't want to risk snagging the cover that comes with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice and cool but too soft for me.
reviews.reviewText: This body pillow is really nice if you're like me and are always looking for that cool spot in the bed but it was far too soft for me. I have hernias in my back and need something to throw my leg over to keep my knee level with my hip and prevent pull.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I let the pillow have three days to expand and reduce smell. Then I put a nice pillowcase on and was initially happy. After a few days, I decided it was too big, so I removed a great deal of stuffing (it is very easy, being it has zippers). Now, it is just right for me, and I'm happy. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t like. Returned.
reviews.reviewText: Broke my knee and wanted something to put leg on at night. This pillow took 24-48 hours to decompress. It was really heavy and bulky. Hard to move around. Also didn’t feel cool and easily conformable. Returned. Wanted it returned in original packaging which was impossible as we couldn’t get it to compress so just put all the original packing in a box with pillow.
